ambusher.name: Ambusher
ambusher.description: It doubles its power if it is in tall grass.

swimmer.name: Swift Swim
swimmer.description: Halves recharge time when in water.

vigilant.name: Vigilant
vigilant.description: It doubles its range if it is in the mountains.

burn.name: Burn
burn.description: The attacks burn the target for 10 seconds, causing them to lose 0.5% of their life per second.

burnNerf.name: Burn
burnNerf.description: Attacks have a 50% chance to burn the target for 10 seconds, causing it to lose 0.5% HP per second.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description:
The attacks apply 1 stack of poison.
			The target loses 0.1% of life per second for each charge.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: The attacks slow the target for 2 seconds.

stunMono.name: Stun
stunMono.description: Attacks have a 30% chance to stun the target for 2 seconds.

stunMonoNerf.name: Stun
stunMonoNerf.description: Attacks have a 5% chance to stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

stunArea.name: Stun
stunArea.description: Attacks have a 30% chance to stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: The attacks ricochet between enemies with reduced damage.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Attacks have a small chance of restoring 1 heart.

greed.name: Greed
greed.description: Attacks grant $ equal to 10% of the targets gold.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Each attack on the same target causes additional damage.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Curse an enemy and deal damage to all cursed enemies.

doubleShot.name: Double Shot
doubleShot.description: Fires projectiles at up to 2 enemies at once.

tripleShot.name: Triple Shot
tripleShot.description: Fires projectiles at up to 3 enemies at once.

quadraShot.name: Quadra Shot
quadraShot.description: Fires projectiles at up to 4 enemies at once.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: The projectiles explode in an area, causing half damage to nearby enemies.

powerAura.name: Power Aura
powerAura.description: Increases damage dealt by Pokmon within range by 20%.

criticalAura.name: Critical Aura
criticalAura.description: Increases the critical damage of Pokmon within range by 33%.

curseDoubleShot.name: Curse DoubleShot
curseDoubleShot.description: Shoots projectiles at up to 2 enemies at once and curses them. Deals damage to all cursed enemies.

poisonDoubleShot.name: Poison DoubleShot
poisonDoubleShot.description: Shoots projectiles at up to 2 enemies at once and applies 1 stack of poison. The target loses 0.1% health per second per stack.

slowSplash.name: Slow Splash
slowSplash.description: Projectiles explode in an area, dealing half damage to nearby enemies and slowing them for 2 seconds.

synchronySplash.name: Synchrony
synchronySplash.description: Projectiles explode in an area, dealing half damage to nearby enemies and spreading the main targets status effects (burn, poison, stun, slow).

castform.name: Forecast
castform.description: Multiplies its damage by 2 in tall grass, its speed by 2 in water, and its range by 2 in mountains.

star.name: star
star.description: Attacks deal 1 additional damage for each star.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.description: Teleports periodically whenever possible. Each teleport grants 100% stackable damage to the next attack.

nightmare.name: nightmare
nightmare.description: Attacks apply 1 nightmare stack. Each stack deals damage equal to 20% of this Pokmons power per second.

bastiodon.name: Fossil Speed
bastiodon.description: Reduces recharge time by 0.5s for each Fossil Pokmon on the team.

rampardos.name: Rock Head
rampardos.description: Increases damage by 5% for each missing heart.

armaldo.name: Critical Ricochet
armaldo.description: Critical projectiles ricochet between enemies and keep ricocheting as long as they remain critical.

cradily.name: Fossil Projectile
cradily.description: Shoots one projectile for each Fossil Pokmon on the team. Attacks slow the target for 2 seconds.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: Transforms into the first Pokmon in the party, copying its stats and ability adjusted to Dittos level.

fieryDance.name: Fiery Dance
fieryDance.description: Doubles damage dealt to burned enemies.

static.name: Static
static.description: Attacks ricochet between enemies with reduced damage and have a 5% chance to stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Turns negative effects of items into positive effects.

firstImpression.name: First Impression
firstImpression.description: The first attack on an enemy deals double damage.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: During the current wave, each time this Pokmon defeats a Pokmon, its damage increases by 3%.

armorBreakDoubleShot.name: Armor Break DoubleShot
armorBreakDoubleShot.description: Fires projectiles at up to 2 enemies at once. Deals double damage to armor.

stanceChange.name: Stance Change
stanceChange.description:
Sword Form: Deals double damage to armor.
Shield Form: Deals area damage and slows enemies for 2 seconds but loses half of its power.

willOWisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
willOWisp.description: If the target is cursed, deals damage to all cursed enemies and burns them.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: The projectile multiplies its damage by 2 for every 120 units of distance traveled.

toughClaws.name: Tough Claws
toughClaws.description: Increases its power by 50% while on a mountain. Sets its critical chance to 100% while in tall grass.

toughClawsDay.name: Tough Claws
toughClawsDay.description: Increases its power by 50% and sets its critical chance to 100% while on a mountain.

toughClawsNight.name: Tough Claws
toughClawsNight.description: Increases its power by 50% and sets its critical chance to 100% while in tall grass.

triage.name: Triage
triage.description: Reduces the recharge time of Pokmon within range by 25%. At the end of the wave, has a 5% chance to recover 1 heart.

scheme.name: Scheme
scheme.description: Each hit has a VERY SMALL chance to turn a team Pokmon that is in its final evolutionary stage shiny.

doubleShotSand.name: Double Shot
doubleShotSand.description: Fires projectiles at up to 2 enemies at once. Doubles its range on Route 2.

quadraShotSand.name: Quadra Shot
quadraShotSand.description: Fires projectiles at up to 4 enemies at once. Doubles its range on Route 2.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.description: Its damage depends on the volume of the game's sound effects.

speedBoost.name: Speed Boost
speedBoost.description: Each attack reduces recharge time by 0.3 seconds, stackable up to 10 times per wave.
